games

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends Object
    This class represents a player

    Version:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    BRUCELLA2

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Display display

      private String playerName

      • giveNumber

        public abstract ArrayList<Integer> giveNumber(int pMaxValueDigit)
        This method is used to obtain a number in the form of an ArrayList of integer.

        This number has a limited number of digits.
        This method is redefined in the different daughter's classes.
        Parameters:
        pMaxValueDigit - The max value digit
        Returns:
        A number in the form of an ArrayList of integer
        See Also:
        getNumberInput(int)

      • getNumberInput

        protected ArrayList<Integer> getNumberInput(int pMaxValueDigit)
        This method allows to get the number entered by the user and return is as an ArrayList of integer.

        Return an empty ArrayList if the input is not valide (too long, no digit character, digit not in the game rules)
        Parameters:
        pMaxValueDigit - The max value digit
        Returns:
        A number in the form of an ArrayList of integer
